amendment.description: An amendment numbered 66 printed in the Congressional Record to make sundry amendments to the bill and add a subparagraph titled "Participation by Fossil Industry Entities".
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to make sundry amendments to the bill and require companies drilling on public lands to submit plans for cutting greenhouse gas emissions associated with production.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Casten amendment (A047) Failed by recorded vote: 199 - 231 (Roll no. 73).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A047) offered by Mr. Casten.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Casten amendment (A047) Failed by recorded vote: 199 - 231 (Roll no. 73).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
